comments:
Description: Exception is thrown out when I try to edit user property/named expression for a library in property editor.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Use a library in a report design.
2. Select this library name in outline view.
3. Edit user property in property editor view.
4. After adding a user property for the imported library, exception is thrown out.
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: The library is read-only and operation is forbidden.
at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException.createGUIException(GUIException.java:76)
